name: HyperGuardian Helmet
description: HyperGuardian hardsuits were built by Kassa Fabrication as a civilian-friendly alternative to the Colossus line intended for private security in heavy-fire situations or extreme environmental conditions. The Initiative considered the bulky and unbreakable HyperGuardian a perfect choice for protecting vulnerable new colonies.
feature: You are considered proficient with this armor even if you lack proficiency with heavy armor.
setBonus: Set bonus (2 of 4): +1 AC. --Set bonus (3 of 4): +10 Shields, +5 Shield Regen. --Set bonus (4 of 4): Once per short rest, as a reaction to taking damage, you may jumpstart your shield regen and immediately gain shield points equal to your regen amount.
